alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 2:32AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN MIDDLESEX AND NORTH CENTRAL NEW HAVEN COUNTIES THROUGH 315 AM EDT... At 232 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Middlefield, or over Meriden, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Meriden, Middletown, Wallingford, East Hampton, Cromwell, Portland, Middlefield, and Lake Pocotopaug--East Hampton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
